metadata.title: CVE-2017-9472 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In ytnef 1.9.2, the SwapDWord function in lib/ytnef.c allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read andapplication crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libytnef: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
